snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion - Longplay (Main Quest) Walkthrough (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion (Main Quest) Walkthrough, Join me on this epic quest as we close shut the jaws of Oblivion. So letting ya'll know this will be part 1 of 4. This video is the Full Main Campaign, but I will be doing 4 oblivion videos in total. My favorite being the Dark Brotherhood. Oblivion has some pretty good quests, the main story was interesting and fun until I had to go retrieve 4 artifacts. After that though the emperor had an awesome lotr inspired speech. I enjoyed that. The Battle with all the soldiers was fun but kind of sad with some of the deaths. Anyways hope you enjoy this longplay. 

Played on Pc (Steam)


Gameplay recorded by Loopy


This is Part 1 of 4.

Future Videos to be released in the coming weeks:

Part 1 - Main Story 
Part 2 - The Arena 
Part 3 - The Dark Brotherhood
Part 4 - The Thieves Guild






👻              👻               👻                👻                 👻





If you feel like donating, 100% of the donations will be for buying more games to do longplays of. If you have requests when donating on paypal, please leave a message of the game your donating for. As I will try to make it a priority.

Paypal donation link - https://www.paypal.me/LoopyLongplays

Patreon donation link - https://www.patreon.com/loopylongplays

Twitter page - https://twitter.com/Loopylongplays
